page.title: 05 A CHILDS HOME
page.content: I live in Laurieston village. Its small but I like it. My house is in a block of three. The outside is small with two tiny gardens. Inside we have four rooms upstairs and three rooms downstairs. Upstairs there are two bedrooms, a boxroom and a bathroom. My sister shares a room with me. It is messy sometimes and the walls are covered with posters. We have a television and record player in our room. The box room is full of junk.The bathroom is small, but neat. It doesn't have a shower. Downstairs the kitchen has a table, two chairs, a cooker, a refrigerator and some units.The living room downstairs has a sofa, two easy chairs,a table, television and a wall unit. A cupboard under the stairs holds dad's tools and ironing board.
